name: wizarr
description: Wizarr is a self-hosted invite management portal for media servers like Jellyfin and Plex. It streamlines onboarding by generating invite links, collecting user details, and provisioning accounts via a friendly web front-end.

features.title: Invite Generation
features.description: Create unique invite links with expiration dates and usage limits for controlled access

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Connect with Jellyfin, Plex, and Emby to automate user provisioning

features.title: Custom Onboarding
features.description: Design welcome pages with instructions, rules, and server information for new users

features.title: Request Management
features.description: Review and approve user requests before granting media server access

features.title: Usage Tracking
features.description: Monitor invite link usage and see which invites have been claimed

features.title: Bulk Invites
features.description: Generate multiple invite codes at once for events or group onboarding

features.title: User Profiles
features.description: Collect user information during signup to maintain organized member records

features.title: Expiration Controls
features.description: Set time-based or usage-based limits on invites to maintain security
